javadoc:
BrowserLoader opens a web browser and displays the given url.
@see ManualViewerCommandWrappedOption

methods.name: display
methods.comment:
Display the content specified by url in a web browser window.  This call will launch 
 a new thread and then immediately return.

methods.name: display
methods.comment:
Display the content specified by url in a web browser window.  This call will launch 
 a new thread and then immediately return.

params.name: url
params.comment: The web URL to show (e.g., http://localhost...).

params.name: fileURL
params.comment: The file URL to show (e.g., file:///path/to/file).

params.name: serviceProvider
params.comment: A service provider from which to get system resources.

name: BrowserLoader
comment: BrowserLoader opens a web browser and displays the given url.
